CameraOffsetMovementSpeedMultiplier.Description: The speed multiplier that is used to move the camera from one position to another when the camera offset is modified.

DefaultCameraOffsetModifier.Description: The default camera offset modifier. Used for most state of the player (eg.: walking, running, interacting)

CrawlingCameraOffsetModifier.Description: The camera offset modifier that is used when a survivor is crawling on the floor.

CarriedCameraOffsetModifier.Description: The camera offset modifier that is used when a survivor is being carried by a Killer.
